Meta.title: PartyWage
Meta.author: mistermeagle
Meta.description:
Pay your party 10% of your on hand orens every month. By default, don't pay salaries at all if you don't have at least 5k.
Settings can be adjusted in your Elin game folder in BepInEx/config/mrmeagle.elin.partywage.cfg
Source code: - https://github.com/swarmdog/ElinMods
This mod was created using a personal GPT loaded with the Elin mod documentation and the discovered CSV data. Tips - start the conversation by asking for an Elin mod template, and refer to Elin often. GPT: - https://chatgpt.com/g/g-6744f2ed7dd481918b4faf55062cafdb-elin-s-inn-c-modder
